db:abstract.db:para: A helper node that is automatically kept pointing at another node.
This type was introduced in Qt 6.4.

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: This helper implements a node that automatically rotates so that it is always pointed towards a specified node. The rotation only happens over X and Y axes.
For example, the following snippet keeps the cylinder pointed at the cube.

db:section.db:title: target : Node
db:section.db:para: Specifies the target node to look at. The default value is null.
